General.Name: Dasheng Times Cultural Investment Co Ltd
General.Description: Dasheng Times Cultural Investment Co., Ltd. engages in the game development, education, and film and television investment and production activities in China. The company was formerly known as Baocheng Investment Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Dasheng Times Cultural Investment Co., Ltd. in June 2016. Dasheng Times Cultural Investment Co., Ltd. was founded in 1993 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
